Get to Know Us.

We are an Innovative tech firm that deals with designing and assembling electronic products. We offer technology solutions in the manufacturing of electronics and networking equipment.

We,ve managed to design and assemble the best and affordable electronic devices including pre-paid energy meters, networking devices, computers, POS solutions and much more.

Download our Profile

Why we Stand Out

What We Do

At Gama™ we are dedicated to finding the right solution, using the right technology, for the right client. This includes getting to know you (our client) better and define the best, innovative custom solution for you.

How we Do It

We employ proven technologies to offer quality products and services. From discovering your unique pain spots, developing a product roadmap to promoting a relationship with you, YOU are top of mind every step of the way.

Why we Do What we Do

We are proud of our commitment and delivery of our core values and our day-to-day services to our clients. Our goal is to provide quality products and services to our customers and to do so with integrity, honour and team work.
